fla 'uqsim bima tubsirun min almryyat, wama la tubsirun mimaa ghab enkm, 'iina alquran lakalam allh, ytlwh rasul eazim alsharaf walfdl, walays biqawl shaeir kama tzemwn, qalilana maa twmnwn, walays bsje ksje alkhan, qalilana maa yakun minkum tdhkkur wtammul llfrq bynhma, wlknh kalam rabu alealamin aldhy 'anzalah ealaa rasulih muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm

wlw addaea muhamad ealayna shyyana lm nqlh, lantqmna wa'akhadhna minh balymyn, thuma laqataena minh nyat qlbh, fala yuqadar ahd minkum 'ana yhjz eanh eqabna. 'iina hdha alquran lezt lilmutaqin aladhin ymtthlwn 'awamir allah wyjtnbwn nwahyh

'ina lanelm ann minkm man ykdhdhib bhdha alquran mae wuduh ayath, wa'iin altkdhyb bih lndamt ezymt ealaa alkafirin bih hin yarawn edhabhm wyrwn naeim almuminin bh, wa'iinah lahaqu thabt wyqyn la shaka fyh. fnzzih allah subhanah eamaa la ylyq bjlalh, wadhkrh basmh alezym

dea dae min almushrikin ealaa nafsih waqawmih bnzwl aleadhab elyhm, wahu waqie bihim yawm alqiamat la mhalt, lays lah mane yamnaeah min allah dhi alelw waljlal, tusaeid almalayikat wajibril 'iilayh taealaa fi yawm kan miqdaruh khamsin 'alf sanat min suniyin aldnya, wahu ealaa almumin mithl salat mktwbt
